features: 【Design for iPhones Family 】This portable iPhone charger is widely compatible with iPhone Series,Such as iPhone 14,iPhone 14 Pro,iPhone 14 Plus,iPhone 14 Pro Max,iPhone 13,iPhone 13 Pro,iPhone 13 Pro Max,iPhone 13 Mini,iPhone 12,iPhone 12 Pro,iPhone 12 Mini,iPhone 12 Pro Max,iPhone 11,iPhone 11 Pro,iPhone 11 Pro Max,iPhone X,iPhone XS Max,iPhone XR,iPhone SE,iPhone 8,iPhone 8 Plus,iPhone 7,iPhone 7 Plus,iPhone 6s,iPhone 6 etc.
【Pocket Size & Convenient】This iPhone portable charger has a mini size as a lipstick, no need a cord,say goodbye to the mess,It’s easy to slip in your pocket or your purse and incredibly portable.

【Safe Protection】Safe circuit design to avoid over-discharge, over-charge, short-circuit, short-circuit or overheating,this battery pack supports pass-through charging,allows you to charge your iPhone and this small power bank simultaneously.Please be assured that it's normal that iPhone power bank getting a little bit hot when using.

【5200mAh Emergency Battery Backup Charger】Portable power bank with a battery capacity of 5200mAh, it can fully charge most iPhone 0.8-1.2 times for your iPhone.Certainly good as emergency charger for daily use or short trips. This portable battery charger can be carried on plane,a perfect travel essentials.
【PD Fast charging】This battery pack support PD fast speed charging,fully recharge this portable iPhone charger about 2.5-3h. 4 LED battery level indicator can easily track the status of your charge.
【What You Will Get】1x5200mAh mini portable charger,1 x USB C cable, 1 x User manual and 2 Years warranty lifetime technical support. If you have any question, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Price and Worked as Expected
reviews.reviewText: Great price, holds a good charge. Haven't tried it a lot but it did work out of the box and came nicely packaged with the charging cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and works well
reviews.reviewText: Love this! I travel a lot so this is the perfect size to pack. It’s not bulky and you can get adult use it while still using your phone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This portable charger is great when you are out and can’t find a place to charge your pad or your phone. It charges fairly quickly and it can fully charge my iPad from zero before the charger dies. I also use it as a prop for my phone when I’m watching TikTok or YouTube videos. Overall, a great product. I give it 4 Stars because the charger dies pretty quickly but it’s great when you’re in a pinch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great backup power
reviews.reviewText: I tend to use my smart devices a lot. And when I am using my phone as a personal hotspot and for Bluetooth, that can really sap its power fairly quickly. Unfortunately, it tends to run down on power at the most inconvenient times.I like this device because it gives me peace of mind about being able to use my phone or tablet for extended periods away from home or office. It is easy to recharge and then just carry around in pocket, purse, backpack, camera bag, or brief case. Then when I find myself with only 5% or less power on my smart device, I can whip this device out and power back up.I also like its form function design and color. It is spiffy and cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice portable power bank that works as it is described and designed to.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice power bank for your iPhone with the lightning connector. Here's why I like it. It is compact. Yes, it has a little weight to it, but all batteries do and this one provides its specified amount of power in a small package. The lightning port fits snugly into the socket on the phone, so no need to worry about thinking its plugged in but it actually isn't charging due to a poor connection. It has led indicators for battery charge level - you can see at a glance about how much power remains in the battery. No, there isn't a digital display showing exact power levels, but at this price point, the LED indicators are a nice touch. It fully meets my expectations, which isn't always the case with items purchased online. This charger works as it is described. It isn't going to charge your phone super-fast, and don't expect multiple phone charges without recharging it. The description says it will fully charge most phones about one time before needing to be recharged, and it does that. One thing to watch out for if you have a thick protective case on your phone - the lightning port is only long enough to reach through a case that is 4 mm thick. That's pretty thick, but it may not work with the extra heavy duty cases. It comes with a USB-C cable for recharging the power bank, but does not come with its own "wall wart", so you will need to provide your own charger. It does accept power-delivery charging, so that is a nice feature as well. Thhs is a nice, compact, portable charger/power bank at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy backup for your purse or car
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to have on hand at trade events in case my iPad started to die. I haven't needed it so far so I decided to test it today. I plugged it into my iPad and it took 10 minutes to go from 37% to 42%. I couldn't tell you if that is fast compared to others, but I'm satisfied with it. It will be a good back up. I was a little disappointed that this didn't come with a drawstring bag to store it in (the one I bought for my phone did) but the cap will keep the connector clean at least, as long as it stays on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fit when phone is in custom case
reviews.reviewText: Well, this works great if you don't have a protective case on your phone. The charging port won't fit into the plug while my iPhone SE 3rd generation is in its case. I've used it in a pinch when I absolutely need to charge my phone on the go, but I have to take the rubber gasket off of the case, then pry the two pieces of the case apart, THEN plug in the charger and leave my phone sitting there out of its protective case while it charges - definitely not ideal.When I do use it, it charges fairly fast, although the charger itself dies quickly and needs recharged frequently, after about one use. (You also have to supply your own charging block to charge it up.) And the little cover on the charging port? It barely stays on and was lost within the first week of carrying it around.It's not perfect for my situation, but I'll keep it around to use in emergencies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel accessory for iPHONE
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect accessory to travel with. I keep it charged and in my bag in case I'm out unexpectedly and my battery is low and need a quick charge. It charges relatively quickly and you can charge your phone about one full time from completely dead or several times if not. This is a great thing to have you if you travel frequently and are unable to get to a charging station. The color is also cute and not as easy to lose as all the black accessories and cords.
